name: NORTH DAKOTA CORN GROWERS ASSOCIATION
description: Represents the legislative and business interests of corn producers in North Dakota.
sampleDescriptions: Support Senate amendment to FY 2018 omnibus funding measure, H.R. 1625, to change the current acreage determination process under the Agriculture Risk Coverage - County Yield program operated by the F
